column1: * 1917 – Thomas Kenneth Barnsley is killed near wikipedia:Ypres while consoling a captured prisoner.
* 1917 – J.R.R. Tolkien attends an annual Minden Day Dinner at either Thirtle Bridge camp or Tunstall Hall.
* 1937 - Voice actor Ian Hogg is born.
* 1959 - J.R.R. Tolkien serves the first Mass of Robert Murray.
* 1969 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mr Burrows.
* 1997 - The German Tolkien Society Deutsche Tolkien Gesellschaft e.V. is founded.
* 2004 - Mythcon 35 at wikipedia:University of Michigan in wikipedia:Ann Arbor
